basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Enterococcus faecium IFO13712 (+++), Enterococcus faecalis IFO12964 (+++), Enterococcus mundtii JCM 8731 (+++), Lactobacillus plantarum ATCC 8041 (+), Lactobacillus lactis NFRI 7307 (+), Lactobacillus curvatus JCM 1096 (+), Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 15313 and ATCC 49594 (++) Note:Symbols:+,sensitive to mundticin KS (+, ++, and +++ reflect the degree of sensitivity).
